issue_name: Information Disclosure Vulnerability in SIMATIC WinCC

1.command: Update WinCC to V7.5 SP2 Update 17 or later version
1.description: Update SIMATIC PCS 7 V9.1 to WinCC V7.5 SP2 Update 17 or later version.

2.command: Update to V19 Update 2 or later version
2.description: Update SIMATIC WinCC Runtime Professional V19 to V19 Update 2 or later version.

3.command: Update to V7.4 SP1 Update 23 or later version
3.description: Update SIMATIC WinCC V7.4 to V7.4 SP1 Update 23 or later version.

4.command: Update to V7.5 SP2 Update 17 or later version
4.description: Update SIMATIC WinCC V7.5 to V7.5 SP2 Update 17 or later version.

5.command: Update to V8.0 Update 5 or later version
5.description: Update SIMATIC WinCC V8.0 to V8.0 Update 5 or later version.

6.command: Restrict access to application webserver for trusted users only
6.description: Restrict access to the application webserver to trusted users only as a workaround.
